fields.name: WHO
fields.value: Margie. A nickname derived from Marguerite. Named after my grandmother. She changed her name to Marguerite from Margarita in order to pass as white.

fields.name: WHAT
fields.value: Writer, graphic designer, transcriptionist, high functioning autism, mental illnesses, traumas, age, existential angst, nostalgia, and mourning.

fields.name: WHERE
fields.value: Las Vegas, NV. Previously Mexico, the UK, Canada, Poland, the Czech Republic, Texas, Illinois, California, universities, beaches, Starbuckses, Barnes & Noble'ses (eh whatever), theater (and theater parties), and libraries.

fields.name: WHEN
fields.value: Now, 7 years ago, then a year before that, a few years before that and then pretty much every year until I graduated from high school.
